descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff]Thank you for seeing. [/color]
[center]
[img]http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/fakesalvia/imgs/8/4/84ee41f0.png[/img][/center]
[color=#00ff00][size=5][b]ABOUT THIS MOD____[/b][/size][/color]

This mod adds a new Standalone Female follower. You can find her [color=#9fc5e8]the Dragonsreach Great Porch[/color].
She uses the magic,[color=#b4a7d6] [/color][color=#8e7cc3][size=3]Lightningbolt[/size][/color], [color=#8e7cc3][size=3]Paralyze[/size][/color], [color=#8e7cc3][size=3]Conjure[/size][/color] and[color=#8e7cc3][size=4] [/size][/color][color=#f9cb9c][size=4]Heal[/size][/color].
[color=#f4cccc][size=3]Hers staff heals Player and Followers[/size][/color]. If You do not want her to heal, Please take a staff away from her.
She is[color=#ff00ff] marriageable[/color] and [color=#ff00ff]essential[/color].

Name: Lira
Sex: Female
Combat style: Mage and Healer
Level: min 10 to max 100
Perk: Light Foot, Silent Roll, Stealth and Other
Body: UNPB weight 0

[b][size=5][color=#00ff00]Credit____[/color]
[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/]Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/]Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/]SG Female Eyebrows by Hello Santa[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/]Mikan Eyes by nerune[/url]

Thanks a lot!!

[/b]
